info.name: ROBLOX Light Background
info.description: ROBLOX site theme that works on most pages. Basically an edited version of the stylish theme found here: https://userstyles.org/styles/114128/roblox-landing but changed to work nicer with the light background.
info.additionalInfo:
Source theme by Artex https://userstyles.org/users/204536

Make sure to edit this theme once added to Stylish to only enable on www.roblox.com !!!!
